body.p: The City Ordinance, that is meant to protect children from any indecent and nervebreaking aspects in daily life, gave the writer the ground to ask a further enlargement of the ordinance, so that it will include the phrase "protecting the children from their parents." Who will protect the children from their parents? (at least some parents).

Some Greek parents teach the youngsters discipline, to say thank you, and to believe that children are brought love in from heaven. This is the way some parents this and are fortented that they give the youngsters an ideal to begin with.
